Change log All releases

randgeo 0.2.3.9100

NEW FEATURES

  • Gains geo_linestring and wkt_linestring (#13) thanks to @samuelbosch

randgeo 0.2.0

NEW FEATURES

All changes thanks to @noamross, and come from (#6) (#7)

Internals of the package are re-worked to have the features:

  • Random points are now evenly distributed on the sphere
  • Random shape vertex distances from the center are now based on equal-scale great-circle arcs
  • Everything is in units of degrees latitude (e.g., ~69 miles or 111 km)

MINOR IMPROVEMENTS

  • More tests were added

randgeo 0.1.0

NEW FEATURES

  • Released to CRAN.
